about_the_game:
Horrors Glade is an exciting horror game that will test your survival skills in a dark and dangerous forest full of monsters and ghosts. You have to go through many trials to stay alive.

You find yourself in a dense dark forest where every step can be the last. You will need to chop down trees, collect stones and other resources, and look for food to survive. But be careful: monsters and ghosts will appear on your path and try to stop you.

The game controls are simple and intuitive. You control the character with the W, A, S, D keys. You can rotate the camera with the Q and E keys. You can open the inventory and crafting menu with the Tab key. You can attack or chop down trees with the left mouse button.

Features of the Horrors Glade game:

  • dark and atmospheric graphics;

  • a variety of monsters and ghosts;

  • the ability to collect resources and look for food;

  • simple and convenient control.

Are you ready to accept the challenge and survive in Horrors Glade? Then go ahead into the dark forest!
